required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Bicentric Study on the Use of ECMO-VV or VA for Severe ARDS Associated With Covid-19
clinical_study.official_title: Bicentric Study on the Use of ECMO-VV or VA for Severe ARDS Associated With Covid-19

brief_summary.textblock: Describes the cohort of patients receiving ECMO-VV or ECMO-VA in the management of severe ARDS refractory to SARS-CoV-2 in the Strasbourg and Louvain centres

primary_outcome.measure: Retrospective description of effect of the ECMO-VV or ECMO-VA in the management of severe ARDS refractory in patients of the Strasbourg and Louvain centres with covid-19
primary_outcome.time_frame: files analysed retrospectily from March 1st, 2020 to August 1st, 2020 will be examined

study_pop.textblock: Adult patients with a COVID-19 diagnosis by RT-PCR

facility.name: Service de Chirurgie Thoracique Nouvel Hôpital Civil Hôpitaux Universitaires de Strasbourg
